title: Fire Wolf, Cinaed
description: This tale of love blooming amid harsh circumstances of questionable survival will warm the fur of werewolf lovers.Five shifters left the colonies in late spring to explore the other side of the mountain range. What could go wrong?Ken was an unmated shifter growing ever more restless and eager for a change. When his brother and the other alphas appointed him to head up an exploration of the other side of the mountain range, he hesitated but accepted. There would be five wolves in the party, three males, two females..In the mountains, in uncharted territory, when spring and winter are still flirting with each other. Anything can happen. Accidents. Injuries. Strangers. Even love.
author: Victoria Danann
